name: Krusty Krab: After Hours
description:
Krusty Krab: After Hours (Prototype)

Play as Plankton to steal the secret formula for Krusty Krab's famous Krabby Patty. Avoid getting caught by Mr. Krabs by hiding under the tables and staying out of his sight. Be careful - it's very dark so use your flashlight to navigate the Krusty Krab!

Music 

House of Horrors

  • 3D modeling by Karoline Lujan
  • Audio design and coding by Citlalli Hernandez
  • Character movement & Lighting by Martin Perina
  • Coding by Minghui Ye
  • Enemy movement by ChunXuan Zhao
  • Concepting and logo by Angela Yim
